text: Joseph Mitchell Minard (January 5, 1932 â€“ January 17, 2022) was an American politician and businessman. He was a Democrat. He was a member of the West Virginia Senate from 1990 until 1994, and again from 1998 until 2013. He was a Delegate in the West Virginia House of Delegates from his appointment in 1983 through 1990. He was born in Clarksburg, West Virginia. Minard died on January 17, 2022 in Clarksburg, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from West Virginia Category:Businesspeople from West Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joseph M. Minard
